title: Simon Majumdar

author: viewerswfyi@wfyi.org (WFYI Public Media)
itunes:author: viewerswfyi@wfyi.org (WFYI Public Media)
description: Matthew chats with author and television personality Simon Majumdar (Food Network) about the new season of his podcast Eat My Globe, food and cinema plus the films of Sean Connery.
